    • Field Detail

      • IdxStart

        public static int IdxStart
        The starting index for input data. Default value is 1 since libsvm and lda use 1.

    • Method Detail

      • readDataVectorsFromStringArray

        public static DataVectors readDataVectorsFromStringArray(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> feaArray)
                                                  throws InvalidInputDataException
        Read data vectors from a string array. Note that an empty string or null will be viewed as an empty sparse vector. Empty sparse vectors commonly occur when a test example only has new features.
        Parameters:
        feaArray - a ArrayList<String>, each element is a string with LIBSVM data format
        Returns:
        a DataVectors instance
        Throws:
        InvalidInputDataException

      • readDataSetFromFile

        public static DataVectors readDataSetFromFile(java.lang.String filePath)
                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              InvalidInputDataException
        Read data vectors from a LIBSVM formatted file. Data format (index starts from 1):

         +1 1:0.708333 2:1 3:1 4:-0.320755 5:-0.105023 6:-1 7:1 8:-0.419847 9:-1 10:-0.225806 12:1 13:-1 
 -1 1:0.583333 2:-1 3:0.333333 4:-0.603774 5:1 6:-1 7:1 8:0.358779 9:-1 10:-0.483871 12:-1 13:1
        Note that an empty string will be viewed as an empty sparse vector. Empty sparse vectors commonly occur when a test example only has new features.
        Parameters:
        filePath - file path
        Returns:
        a DataVectors instance
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        InvalidInputDataException
